messages.subject: Re:Kinda OT - recommendations
messages.msgSnippet: ... looking for a new physician and dentist in the Boston and/or greater  Boston area. The further on our unschooling journey we get, the less I feel  able to
messages.messageBody:
>>Hello All, I beg your pardon for this slightly off topic request; I am
looking for a new
physician and dentist in the Boston and/or greater Boston area. The further
on our
unschooling journey we get, the less I feel able to deal with docs and
dentists from
mainstream medical community. Does anyone have any recommendations for heath
care
practitioners -- alternative, gentle, relationship oriented practitioners
with wisdom and deep
knowledge about all aspects of well-being and medicine? Thank you,<<

Where in Boston are you?I have a doctor that I adore who sees lots of
unschoolers. He's a homeopath as well as MD, and very cool. His name is Leonard
Horowitz, and he is in Danvers. Depending where you are it could be a trek, but
maybe worth it for a good doctor.

Kathryn Baptista


Come to the Northeast Unschooling conference Memorial Day Weekend, May 22-24
2008 in Peabody, Massachusetts _www.northeastunschoolingconference.com_
(http://www.northeastunschoolingconference.com/)




************************************** See what's new at http://www.aol.com


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Kinda OT - recommendations
messages.msgSnippet: Hello All, I beg your pardon for this slightly off topic request;  I am looking for a new physician and dentist in the Boston and/or greater Boston area.  The
messages.messageBody:
Hello All, I beg your pardon for this slightly off topic request; I am looking for a new
physician and dentist in the Boston and/or greater Boston area. The further on our
unschooling journey we get, the less I feel able to deal with docs and dentists from
mainstream medical community. Does anyone have any recommendations for heath care
practitioners -- alternative, gentle, relationship oriented practitioners with wisdom and deep
knowledge about all aspects of well-being and medicine? Thank you,

Ann
(mom to dd 13 and ds14 and ds14)
